How does AI understand you? 

Tokenization! 
Text breaks into "tokens" (words/sub-words), each getting a unique ID from a vocabulary. Like looking up a word, this ID is how LLMs understand. 
Tokenization: Text -> Tokens -> IDs (pre-defined vocab). Simple! 
#LLM #Tokenization #NLP
